Articles.Content:
I\'ve been wanting to make parts for a while, but up until now I\'ve had zero knowledge about 3D modelling. I don\'t have anything planned out so for now these parts will just be whatever random things I decide to make.

HAL 9000

This part acts as a radial MechJeb part and requires the MechJeb plugin.

Download: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/69866888/hal9000_1.0.zip

Voyager\'s Golden Record

This part is a small replica of the golden record on Voyager. After finishing this part I saw that someone else is making a Voyager replica, which includes the golden record, so when they finish their pack I may take down this part.

Download: https://dl.dropbox.com/u/69866888/goldrecord_1.0.zip

If you have any comments or suggestions please feel free to post, but do keep in mind that I am an absolute beginner at part making.

Your not the only one who lacks knowledge of Blender and such, ddavies425.

Sofar, i\'ve tried so many times to build a part, but i still haven\'t had any luck with it.

I like the idea of a HAL 9000 MechJeb. Frankly, i would have called it a KEL 9000 but that\'s my twisted sense of humor.

I\'ve downloaded it and I will try it out later this evening. Looking at the screenprint, it gives me hope that i will be able to succeed someday (in the far, far future i\'m afraid).

I will report back on the functioning of the part as soon as i\'ve tried it.

Dat HAL. Yes.

+9,000 to you, my sir. *tips hat*

Frankly, i would have called it a KEL 9000 but that\'s my twisted sense of humor.

I was actually thinking of naming it PAL 9000, but I thought that would sound ridiculous.

I was actually thinking of naming it PAL 9000, but I thought that would sound ridiculous.

It doesn\'t sound ridiculous, only .... somehow it reminds me of Marvin, the android of the Sirius Cybernetics Corporation. ( ;D )
The depressing robot? I doubt he\'d be anyone\'s pal. :b

Added a small replica of the golden record from Voyager. After finishing this part I saw that someone else is making a Voyager replica, which includes the golden record, so when they finish their pack I may take down this one.
